Coding Education Curator, Do Self Coding

I'm writing a blog about coding education. I also communicate with the readers via 'Q Talk', which means a curation talk.

Presentation at DVCON 2019

I gave a presentation about my paper about resource management using reinforcement learning at DVCON 2019.

PresentationDVCONSoC Design VerificationGermany2019
Samsung Dream Class

I volunteered for Samsung Dream Class, a program created by Samsung to connect middle school students and volunteers from universities. I taught students English for a year.

EducationVolunteerEnglish2017
Presentation at ISUVR 2017

I gave a presentation about my paper about virtual agent based on smartphone interface for the elderly at ISUVR 2019.

PresentationISUVRVirtual RealityJapan2017
OpenStack Volunteer

I volunteered for OpenStack Korea exhibition for 3 consecutive years; 2017, 2018 and 2019

Exhibition at MWC 2017

I exhibited a smart bicycle lock, BISECU, at MWC 2017. MWC is one the largest IT exhibition with CES and IFA.

Smartphone Education for the Elderly

I and my team volunteered to let the elderly know how to use smartphone. The volunteer was broadcasted in the local news.
